mean_cn: n.养老金，抚恤金；廉租屋；  v.给……发养老金
mean_en: an amount of money paid regularly by a government or company to somebody who is considered to be too old or too ill/sick to work
sentence: After they retired, my grandparents received a pension every month.
sentence_trans: 退休之后，我爷爷奶奶每个月都能领到一笔养老金。
word_etyma: pens花费 + ion名词后缀 → 政府给老年人等花费的钱 → pension养老金
